serviceOfferings.title: Registered Drop-In Care
serviceOfferings.description: Flexible hourly care for registered families with member pricing

serviceOfferings.title: Non-Registered Drop-In Care
serviceOfferings.description: Hourly care for walk-in families at standard rates

serviceOfferings.title: Monthly Block Plans
serviceOfferings.description: Prepaid credit plans for registered families with bonus value

safetyFeatures: Secure entry system with key card access
Interior cameras in all common areas
First aid stations in each room

policies.dropIn: No advance reservation required - walk-ins welcome

membership.registered: Reduced hourly rates and bonus credits on block plans
membership.nonRegistered: Standard hourly rates, no block plan bonuses

policies.payment: Hourly rates, block plans available, cash/card accepted
policies.ratios: State-compliant child-to-staff ratios maintained at all times
policies: Children must be accompanied by parent/guardian for check-in
Valid ID required for child pickup
Maximum stay limits may apply during peak hours
Sick child policy - no fever or contagious symptoms
Parents responsible for providing snacks if needed

hoursOfOperation.holidays: Check website or call for holiday hours

competitiveAdvantages.title: Flexible Scheduling
competitiveAdvantages.description: Unlike traditional daycares, we accommodate irregular schedules and last-minute needs

competitiveAdvantages.title: No Long-Term Contracts
competitiveAdvantages.description: Pay as you go - no monthly commitments required for drop-in services

competitiveAdvantages.title: Extended Hours
competitiveAdvantages.description: Open 13 hours daily, including weekends for working parents

competitiveAdvantages.title: All Ages Welcome
competitiveAdvantages.description: Care for children from 6 months to 12 years in one convenient location

competitiveAdvantages.title: Licensed & Insured
competitiveAdvantages.description: Fully licensed facility with comprehensive insurance coverage

competitiveAdvantages.title: Experienced Staff
competitiveAdvantages.description: All caregivers have early childhood education background and ongoing training
